definition: to choose arbitrarily/to take whichever one fancies
surname Ren/Ren County 任縣|任县[Ren2 Xian4] in Hebei

to assign/to appoint/to take up a post/office/responsibility/to let/to allow/to give free rein to/no matter (how, what etc)/classifier for terms served in office, or for spouses, girlfriends etc (as in 前任男友)
to choose/to pick/to select/to elect

sentences.english: If you could live any place in the world, where would it be?
sentences.chinese: 如果我能任选居处，我希望住在那里？

sentences.english: Optionally the olefinic naphtha has a low content of acids.
sentences.chinese: 任选地，所述烯烃石脑油含低含量的酸。

sentences.english: These polypeptides may optionally be used in combination with pneumococcal saccharides.
sentences.chinese: 这些多肽任选与肺炎球菌糖联用。

sentences.english: The composition may optionally also comprise one or more short-chain alcohols.
sentences.chinese: 该组合物还可任选地包含一种或多种短链醇。

sentences.english: Les 5 Sens offers a lunch menu, allowing you to choose one entree and a dessert for RMB38.
sentences.chinese: 乐尚的中午菜单中任选一款主菜和甜点只需要38元。
这是可以任选的功能部件。

sentences.english: Optional height from the base to a certain distance.
sentences.chinese: 从基部至某一任选高处的距离。

sentences.english: The name can be anything; we'll use the provider type.
sentences.chinese: 名称可以任选，我们将使用与提供者类型相同的名称。

sentences.english: You may pick out any two books listed here.
sentences.chinese: 你可以在这图书目录中任选两本。

sentences.english: The tunnel stove has electric heating and gas type two kinds, chose any one kind of them.
sentences.chinese: 隧道炉有电加热炉和燃气炉二种，任选一种。

sentences.english: Can, optionally, be launched from a catapult and retrieved by parachute deployment.
sentences.chinese: 能够，任选采用弹射器发射和降落伞回收。

sentences.english: Optionally, the formulation may further comprise an immediate release acetylsalicylic acid formulation.
sentences.chinese: 任选地，该制剂可进一步包含速释乙酰水杨酸制剂。

definition: to choose by oneself/free to choose/optional/self-service
available/optional
any/arbitrary/at will/at random
first come first served
to receive/to be given/to be presented with
according to the situation/pragmatic/random
abbr. for 特別優惠|特别优惠[te4 bie2 you1 hui4]/ex gratia
buy one, get one free/two for the price of one
to include (as a free gift, when buying sth)/to come with
and so on/in a similar fashion
all are OK/both are OK/all can/both can/also can
fancy or simple according to sb's budget (idiom)
set meal/product or service package (e.g. for a cell phone subscription)
coupon/voucher
half price
each person/everybody/per person
